Name: Classic Cabin
Content: Babylonia Command Bureau's classic situation room.

Name: Classic Loudspeaker
Content: Let's play a vintage song from the Golden Age.

Name: Social Interaction
Content: Let's gather everyone around and have fun!

Name: Sea Isle
Content: Beach activity. Surfing or speedboating?

Name: Dazzling Stage
Content: Time to dance! Okay, actually no one has ever gone up there and danced.

Name: Lay Down
Content: Lie down and sleep away.

Name: Sit Tight
Content: Sit in the chair.

Name: Romance by the Sea
Content: Who will you bump into today?

Name: Summer
Content: Toward the sea in summer.

Name: Coconut Trees
Content: Coconut juice and orange soda. Which one would you choose?

Name: Joyous New Year
Content: Happy Lantern Festival! Commandants!

Name: Nighttime Fireworks
Content: Easterly winds send a thousand trees ablaze at night, blowing stars down like rain.

Name: Yard
Content: Kowloong-Style New Year Yard

Name: Falling Snow
Content: When petals fly into my home, I watch as the green bamboo turns to jade branches.

Name: Temple Fair
Content: Spring couplets, kites, snacksâ€”so much to pick from!

Name: Summer Island
Content: Break free from gravity and let your body feel the embrace of sky.

Name: Sky Overlook
Content: Ah, the soft and fluffy sea of clouds.

Name: Waterfall
Content: Cannot see where it ends.

Name: Fountain
Content: The splashing water brings along a refreshing coolness.

Name: Breeze
Content: A rare refreshing break from the summer heat.

Name: Happy New Year
Content: Happy New Year! Commandants!

Name: The Courtyard
Content: We welcome another new year in this courtyard. Will the people who once celebrated together reunite here again?

Name: Snow Blossoms
Content: Are these flowers or snowflakes? They feel so chill, carrying the fragrance of pear blossoms.

Name: Fishing
Content: When you have time, come to the courtyard and experience the tranquil joy of fishing.

Name: Brewing Tea
Content: Fancy some tea? There are also roasted sweet potatoes, oranges, and rice cakes. I want some bottled milk tea too!

Name: Midsummer
Content: What is summer to you? To me, it's sunshine, frog croaks, and the warm breeze brushing through the leaves.

Name: Art Exhibition
Content: Capture the memories with a paintbrush. It won't just bring back memories, sometimes, it'll bring little surprises too.

Name: Cold Drink
Content: What can I get for you? Can't decide? Just leave it to the almighty vending machine!

Name: Mysterious Conversation
Content: Wander around and listen to the secrets of the trash cans and the sculptures.

Name: Summer Blossom
Content: The garden is nice, but don't forget your bug spray!

Name: Improvisation
Content: A well-preserved piano that allows one to play any song they like.

Name: Sea of Flowers
Content: The barren wasteland has turned into a stunning sea of purple blue flowers under someone's care.

Name: Whalesong Isle
Content: The whispers of whales and the floating island. Let's explore more.

Name: Starry Sky
Content: Wish you a nice dream under the starry sky and the fish swimming in it.

Name: Dreamland
Content: A scene that only belongs to the dreamland.
